text: ninnalute kuttattil avar purappettirunnenkil nasamallate marreannum avar ninnalkk kututal netittarumayirunnilla. ninnalkk kulappam varuttan agrahiccukeant ninnalute itayilute avar parakkampayukayum ceyyumayirunnu. ninnalute kuttattil avar parayunnat cevikeatutt kelkkunna cilarunt tanum. allahu akramikalepparri nannayi ariyunnavananâ€Œ
